Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are followed by SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers across all process variants
Number of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are preceded by SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that eventually lead to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in variants that result in SW-EIC Accept versus those that result in SW-EIC Reject
Metric: Frequency of activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that are repeated more than once within the same case
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Ratio of SW-AE Assign Reviewers to SW-Reviewer Declined occurrences
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in cases where SW-Reviewer No Response appears
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer No Response' occurs

Name: Percentage of all SW-AE Assign Reviewers executions relative to the total number of activity executions in the log
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Number of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that directly precede SW-Reviewer Agreed without any intervening decline or unavailability events
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants containing SW-AE Assign Reviewers that also contain at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of SW-AE Assign Reviewers in the initial reviewer selection phase versus in reassignment phases (e.g., after Assign a Different Editor)
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'Assign a Different Editor' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that occur after a Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1 or Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers that occur before any deadline-related activity (e.g., SW-Reviewer Selection is due in 1 week)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of SW-AE Assign Reviewers out of all reviewer assignment-related activities (e.g., RW-AE Assign Reviewers, RSW-AE Assign Reviewers)
Metric: ERROR: computing metric {'count': activity == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'", 'metric_condition': '> 0', 'aggregation': 'percentage', 'filter': "activity in ['SW-AE Assign Reviewers', 'RW-AE Assign Reviewers', 'RSW-AE Assign Reviewers']"}"
